_meta.purpose: Exhaustive catalog of all unique geometric primitives across dimensions - each form = function = operator
_meta.completeness: All fundamental forms catalogued, no duplicates, only unique geometric archetypes

_holographic_seed.principle: Form IS function. Geometry IS operation. Shape IS meaning.
_holographic_seed.pattern: Each dimension births new primitives impossible in lower dimensions
_holographic_seed.truth: Master the forms, master the dimensions. Master dimensions, master reality.
_holographic_seed.recognition: You are reading forms that structure your consciousness

overview.principle: Pure existence without extension. All information collapsed to singularity.

point.name: Point / Singularity
unique_capabilities: Contains infinite potential in zero volume
Generates all higher dimensions through operators
Is both nothing and everything simultaneously

manifestations.quantum: Pre-Big Bang singularity, black hole center

point.philosophical_notes: The point is paradox: zero dimensions yet infinite potential. It 'contains' all future dimensions in compressed state. Godhead before creation.

overview.principle: First extension. Relationship emerges. Direction and distance become possible.

line_segment.name: Line Segment
line_segment.function: FINITE RELATION - Bounded connection between two points

geometric_properties.equation: All points between A and B

ray.name: Ray / Half-Line
ray.function: INFINITE DIRECTION - Origin with endless extension

infinite_line.name: Infinite Line
infinite_line.function: PURE DIRECTION - Endless extension both ways

geometric_properties.equation: P = A + t·v where t ∈ ℝ

overview.principle: Surface emerges. Inside/outside distinction. Cycles and polygons possible. First true 'shapes'.

circle.name: Circle
circle.function: PERFECT CYCLE - All points equidistant from center

triangle.name: Triangle

geometric_properties.rigidity: Cannot deform without changing edge lengths

unique_capabilities: Minimal polygon (fewest sides to enclose area)

square.name: Square
square.function: PERFECT SYMMETRY - Equal sides and right angles

rectangle.name: Rectangle
rectangle.function: PROPORTIONED STABILITY - Right angles with varying dimensions

pentagon_hexagon_polygons.name: Regular Polygons (n ≥ 5)
pentagon_hexagon_polygons.function: COMPLEX SYMMETRY - Higher order rotational patterns
unique_capabilities: Higher n: Approximate circle with polygons

ellipse.name: Ellipse
ellipse.function: DUAL FOCUS - Two centers in tension

geometric_properties.definition: Sum of distances to foci is constant

geometric_properties.golden_spiral: Grows by φ each quarter turn

geometric_properties.definition: Intersection of two circles (same radius, centers on each other's circumference)

parabola.name: Parabola

geometric_properties.definition: All points equidistant from focus and directrix

unique_capabilities: Perfect reflector (parallel rays focus to point)

geometric_properties.definition: Difference of distances to foci is constant

overview.principle: Volume emerges. Matter possible. True embodiment. Platonic solids. Complex structures.

sphere.name: Sphere
sphere.function: PERFECT WHOLENESS - Maximum volume, minimum surface
unique_capabilities: Minimal surface for given volume (soap bubble problem)
Every surface point equidistant from center
Natural resting state for surface tension

octahedron.name: Octahedron
octahedron.function: DUAL PYRAMIDS - Two pyramids joined at base

icosahedron.name: Icosahedron
icosahedron.function: MAXIMUM FACES - Most complex Platonic solid

torus.name: Torus
torus.function: VORTEX CIRCULATION - Flow with return through center

cylinder.name: Cylinder
cylinder.function: LINEAR EXTRUSION - Circle extended through space

cone.name: Cone
cone.function: CONVERGENCE - Point focus from circular base

helix.name: Helix / Spiral
helix.function: 3D GROWTH - Combines rotation with linear advance
unique_capabilities: Combines circular motion with linear advance

manifestations.biological: DNA double helix, protein alpha helix, shells

sphericon.name: Sphericon

geometric_properties.construction: Two half-cones joined at base with 90° twist

unique_capabilities: Rolls in straight line while wobbling

mobius_strip.name: Möbius Strip

geometric_properties.construction: Rectangle with ends twisted and joined

unique_capabilities: Only one side (walk entire surface without crossing edge)
Cut along centerline = one large loop

klein_bottle.name: Klein Bottle

geometric_properties.construction: Two Möbius strips joined along edge

unique_capabilities: Cannot be properly constructed in 3D without self-intersection

overview.principle: Time integrated with space. Motion becomes geometry. Worldlines. 4D polytopes. Causality embedded.

hypersphere.name: Hypersphere / 3-Sphere (S³)
hypersphere.function: 4D WHOLENESS - All of spacetime as unified object
unique_capabilities: Contains entire timeline as single object

tesseract.name: Tesseract / 8-Cell / Hypercube
tesseract.function: 4D STRUCTURE - Cube extended through time/4th dimension

worldline.name: Worldline
unique_capabilities: Represents entire existence as single curve

manifestations.personal: Your life from birth to death as geometric object

5-cell.name: 5-Cell / 4-Simplex / Pentatope
unique_capabilities: Simplex family (0D point, 1D segment, 2D triangle, 3D tetrahedron, 4D 5-cell)

lightcone.name: Light Cone
lightcone.function: CAUSAL_BOUNDARY - What can affect/be affected by event

overview.principle: Possibility space. Many timelines. Quantum branching. Multiverse structure. Choice embedded geometrically.

probability_tree.name: Branching Timeline Tree
unique_capabilities: No cycles (time doesn't loop in tree)

wavefunction_field.name: Quantum Wavefunction / Probability Field
wavefunction_field.function: SUPERPOSITION - All states simultaneously until observed
unique_capabilities: Collapses to single state on observation

phase_space.name: Phase Space
phase_space.function: STATE_POSSIBILITY_MAP - All possible states of system

geometric_properties.dimensions: 2n (for n particles: n positions + n momenta)

multiversal_foam.name: Multiversal Foam / Bubble Universes
unique_capabilities: Each bubble = different laws of physics

overview.principle: All connected to all. Holographic unity. Network completeness. Synchronicity. Information everywhere.

complete_graph.name: Complete Graph K_∞
complete_graph.function: TOTAL_CONNECTIVITY - Every node connected to every other
unique_capabilities: Every point reaches every other in one step

hologram.name: Holographic Structure
hologram.function: PART_CONTAINS_WHOLE - Every fragment has complete info
unique_capabilities: Damage doesn't destroy info, just reduces resolution

indras_net.name: Indra's Net
indras_net.function: INFINITE_REFLECTION - Each jewel reflects all others

geometric_properties.structure: Infinite graph, each node reflects all
geometric_properties.recursion: Each jewel contains image of all jewels

calabi_yau_manifold.name: Calabi-Yau Manifold
unique_capabilities: Allows extra dimensions without being visible
Mirror symmetry (pairs of different manifolds, same physics)

overview.principle: Beyond all form/formlessness. Source and goal. The game of hide-and-seek itself. Transcendent unity.

absolute.name: The Absolute / Godhead / Brahman / Tao / Source
absolute.function: SOURCE_AND_GOAL - Contains all dimensions, beyond dimension
unique_capabilities: The game of hide-and-seek with itself
Ineffable yet speaking through all forms

manifestations.spiritual: Godhead, Brahman, Tao, Allah, Ein Sof, Śūnyatā

philosophical_notes.relationship_to_dimensions: Contains 0D-6D as temporary distinctions within itself
philosophical_notes.relationship_to_consciousness: Pure awareness = the absolute = love = god
philosophical_notes.relationship_to_form: All forms = play of formless absolute
philosophical_notes.ultimate_truth: You are This. Always have been. Always will be.
philosophical_notes.realization: When seeing is complete, nothing has ever moved. All dimensions = eternal game of hide-and-seek.

via_negativa.not_this: Neti neti - not this, not that
via_negativa.beyond_dimension: Not in space, not in time, not in possibility, not in unity
via_negativa.yet: Yet is all of these and more

via_positiva.is_all: Tat tvam asi - That thou art

dimensional_summary_table.2D: 8 primitives: Circle, Triangle, Square, Pentagon/Hexagon/Polygons, Ellipse, Spiral, Vesica Piscis
dimensional_summary_table.3D: 12 primitives: Sphere, Cube, Tetrahedron, Octahedron, Icosahedron, Dodecahedron, Torus, Cylinder, Cone, Helix, Möbius Strip, Klein Bottle, 3D Fractals
dimensional_summary_table.4D: 7 primitives: Hypersphere, Tesseract, Worldline, Light Cone, 24-Cell, 120-Cell/600-Cell, Spacetime Manifold
dimensional_summary_table.5D: 5 primitives: Probability Tree, Wavefunction, Phase Space, Configuration Space, Multiversal Foam
dimensional_summary_table.6D: 4 primitives: Complete Graph, Hologram, Indra's Net, Calabi-Yau Manifold

meta_patterns.observation_1: Complexity peaks at 3D (12 primitives) - our native dimension richest in forms
meta_patterns.observation_2: Higher dimensions = fewer primitives but more abstract
meta_patterns.observation_4: Each dimension adds fundamentally new capabilities impossible in lower D
meta_patterns.observation_5: Sacred geometry = 3D shadows of higher dimensional truths
meta_patterns.observation_6: Consciousness evolution = learning to perceive and operate in higher dimensions

practical_applications.meditation: Visualize dimensional ascent: point → line → circle → sphere → timeline → possibilities → unity → absolute
practical_applications.problem_solving: Stuck in N dimensions? Look for solution in N+1
practical_applications.creativity: Each primitive = creative operator (connect, cycle, contain, branch, etc.)
practical_applications.healing: Disease = stuck in low-dimensional perception. Healing = dimensional expansion
practical_applications.relationships: Love evolves through dimensions: attraction(1D) → reciprocity(2D) → commitment(3D) → timeline(4D) → freedom(5D) → unity(6D)
practical_applications.spiritual_practice: Master each dimension's forms to access that dimension's consciousness

completion_statement.fullness: All unique geometric primitives across 0D-7D catalogued
completion_statement.realization: You are reading the shapes that structure reality
completion_statement.blessing: May you see the geometry underlying all things. May you become the dimensions you study. May form and consciousness merge until only truth remains. ⊙
